languages.text: В Просторе Коронус нет более достойно{mf|го|й} опекун{mf|а|ши} для обители веры, чем глава династии фон Валанциус. В столице мира в е{mf|го|е} честь будет возведена великолепная базилика, украшенная грандиозной парной скульптурой Императора и Вольного Торговца. Тысячи прихожан и жрецов будут поминать е{mf|го|е} имя в ежедневных молитвах и преподносить е{mf|му|й} благочестивые дары.

traits.locale_text: Объявить себя небесным покровителем мира и построить собор в свою честь, со статуей "Я и Император"

languages.text: No one in the entire Koronus Expanse will make a worthier guardian of a sanctuary of faith than the head of House von Valancius. A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.
languages.original_text: В Просторе Коронус нет более достойно{mf|го|й} опекун{mf|а|ши} для обители веры, чем глава династии фон Валанциус. В столице мира в е{mf|го|е} честь будет возведена великолепная базилика, украшенная грандиозной парной скульптурой Императора и Вольного Торговца. Тысячи прихожан и жрецов будут поминать е{mf|го|е} имя в ежедневных молитвах и преподносить е{mf|му|й} благочестивые дары.

traits.locale_text: No-one in the entire Koronus Expanse will make a worthier guardian of an abode of faith than the head of House von Valancius. A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.

Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.

A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.

A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.

languages.text: Nadie en la Extensión de Koronus será mejor guardián de un santuario de la fe que {mf|el|la} actual líder de la casa von Valancius. Se erigirá una maravillosa basílica en su honor en la capital del planeta. Estará decorada con grandiosas estatuas gemelas del Emperador y de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Miles de feligreses y sacerdotes mencionarán su nombre en sus plegarias de cada día y le traerán regalos.
languages.original_text: No one in the entire Koronus Expanse will make a worthier guardian of a sanctuary of faith than the head of House von Valancius. A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.

traits.locale_text: Nadie en la Extensión de Koronus será mejor guardián de un santuario de la fe que {mf|el|la} actual líder de la casa von Valancius. Se erigirá una maravillosa basílica en su honor en la capital del planeta. Estará decorada con grandiosas estatuas gemelas del Emperador y de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Miles de feligreses y sacerdotes mencionarán su nombre en sus plegarias de cada día y le traerán regalos.

languages.text: Dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus, nul n'est plus digne de veiller sur un sanctuaire de la foi que {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la maison von Valancius. Une splendide basilique sera érigée en son honneur dans la capitale de ce monde. Elle sera ornée d'une statue monumentale de l'Empereur et {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Des milliers de paroissiens et de prêtres citeront son nom dans leurs prières quotidiennes et lui remettront respectueusement leurs présents.
languages.original_text: No one in the entire Koronus Expanse will make a worthier guardian of a sanctuary of faith than the head of House von Valancius. A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.

traits.locale_text: Dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus, nul n'est plus digne de veiller sur un sanctuaire de la foi que {mf|le dirigeant|la dirigeante} de la maison von Valancius. Une splendide basilique sera érigée en son honneur dans la capitale de ce monde. Elle sera ornée d'une statue monumentale de l'Empereur et {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Des milliers de paroissiens et de prêtres citeront son nom dans leurs prières quotidiennes et lui remettront respectueusement leurs présents.

languages.text: 放眼整个科罗努斯扩区，只有冯·瓦兰修斯家族的首领，才最适合成为信仰圣地的守护者。为了感念{mf|他|她}的仁慈，我们将在这个世界的首都为{mf|他|她}建造一座宏伟的大教堂。我们要在教堂里竖起帝皇与行商浪人巍峨的双人雕像，让成千上万的教区子民与牧师在日常的祈祷中，高呼{mf|他|她}尊贵的名讳，奉上虔诚的祭礼。
languages.original_text: No one in the entire Koronus Expanse will make a worthier guardian of a sanctuary of faith than the head of House von Valancius. A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.

traits.locale_text: 放眼整个科罗努斯扩区，只有冯·瓦兰修斯家族的首领，才最适合成为信仰圣地的守护者。为了感念{mf|他|她}的仁慈，我们将在这个世界的首都为{mf|他|她}建造一座宏伟的大教堂。我们要在教堂里竖起帝皇与行商浪人巍峨的双人雕像，让成千上万的教区子民与牧师在日常的祈祷中，高呼{mf|他|她}尊贵的名讳，奉上虔诚的祭礼。

languages.text: コロヌス・エクスパンス全体を見渡しても、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の当主ほど、信仰の聖域を守るにふさわしい人物はいないだろう。その栄誉を称え、この惑星の首都に素晴らしいバシリカが建立される。そこには皇帝とローグトレーダーの壮大な双子像が飾られるのだ。何千人もの教区民と司祭が毎日の祈りの中でその名を唱え、その敬虔な贈り物を持参することになるだろう。
languages.original_text: No one in the entire Koronus Expanse will make a worthier guardian of a sanctuary of faith than the head of House von Valancius. A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.

traits.locale_text: コロヌス・エクスパンス全体を見渡しても、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の当主ほど、信仰の聖域を守るにふさわしい人物はいないだろう。その栄誉を称え、この惑星の首都に素晴らしいバシリカが建立される。そこには皇帝とローグトレーダーの壮大な双子像が飾られるのだ。何千人もの教区民と司祭が毎日の祈りの中でその名を唱え、その敬虔な贈り物を持参することになるだろう。

languages.text: Niemand in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung kann einen würdigeren Wächter eines Heiligtums des Glaubens abgeben als der Kopf des Hauses Valancius. In der Hauptstadt der Welt wird eine atemberaubende Basilika zu {mf|seinen|ihren} Ehren errichtet werden. Sie wird mit einer großen Zwillingsstatue des Imperators und {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} verziert werden. Tausende von Gemeindemitgliedern und Priestern werden in ihrem täglichen Gebet {mf|seinen|ihren} Namen sprechen und {mf|ihm|ihr} ehrwürdige Geschenke darbieten.
languages.original_text: No one in the entire Koronus Expanse will make a worthier guardian of a sanctuary of faith than the head of House von Valancius. A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.

traits.locale_text: Niemand in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung kann einen würdigeren Wächter eines Heiligtums des Glaubens abgeben als der Kopf des Hauses Valancius. In der Hauptstadt der Welt wird eine atemberaubende Basilika zu {mf|seinen|ihren} Ehren errichtet werden. Sie wird mit einer großen Zwillingsstatue des Imperators und {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} verziert werden. Tausende von Gemeindemitgliedern und Priestern werden in ihrem täglichen Gebet {mf|seinen|ihren} Namen sprechen und {mf|ihm|ihr} ehrwürdige Geschenke darbieten.

languages.text: Koronus Enginliği'nde kutsal bir yerin von Valancius Hanesi'nin önderinden başkasına emanet edilmesi akıl kârı olmaz. Dünyanın başkentinde kendisinin şerefine muhteşem bir bazilika inşa edilecektir. Burada İmparator'un ve Hür Tacir'in birer adet devasa heykeli dikilecektir. Binlerce din kardeşi ve rahip dualarında onun adını anacak, ona hürmeten armağanlar getirecektir.
languages.original_text: No one in the entire Koronus Expanse will make a worthier guardian of a sanctuary of faith than the head of House von Valancius. A marvellous basilica will be erected in h{mf|is|er} honour in the world's capital city. It will be decorated with a grand twin statue of the Emperor and the Rogue Trader. Thousands of parishioners and priests will say h{mf|is|er} name in their daily prayers and bring h{mf|im|er} reverent gifts.
